name: To Liberation
description:
To Liberation is a single-player turn-based strategy game, that features 2D art in a 3D world.

Command a squad of 4 members, each member has varied weapons and abilities.

The player will have to make tactical decisions to defeat A.I. controlled enemies.

Made by three senior year college students from MICA.

Lead Designer & Project Manager: Puhan Sun

Level & Audio Designer: Zining Wang

Artist: Jerome Tieh
